name: sanity-data-access
// targets: to see all targets run: nx show project sanity-data-access --web

options.command: doppler run --command='cd libs/vendors/sanity/data-access/src && sanity schema validate && sanity typegen generate && sanity schema extract'
doppler run --command='cd libs/vendors/sanity/data-access/src && sanity schema extract'
doppler run --command='cd libs/vendors/sanity/data-access/src && sanity typegen generate'
doppler run --command='cd libs/vendors/sanity/data-access/src && sanity schema validate'
